content: One of the editors was without power yesterday due to the storm in the NE. They've requested permission to make this change post freeze - does FMG think this is ok?

Well, the key question is what the impact is on IGs. I'm not clear from looking at the spreadsheet what the proposed change is. However, there are two device-based CGs and device may appear in a few others. I'd have them raise the change on the committer's list (in descriptive rather than spreadsheet form). If no-one hollers after 24 hours, then give them the go-ahead.
